TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted civil proceedings before the ORG seeking annulment of a purchase contract .
CARDINAL . On DATE the first - instance court annulled the contract . An appeal was lodged .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the appeal and remitted the case for re - examination .
CARDINAL . DATE and DATE CARDINAL hearings were held .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant withdrew the claim and a decision on termination of proceedings was issued on DATE .
CARDINAL . A description of relevant domestic law can be found in the PERSON v. GPE decision ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , DATE , § § CARDINAL ) .
